AltName.entry: REFUGEE AND ASYLUM SEEKERS VOLUNTEERING PROJECT

Desc.entry: A registered charity project based at Voluntary Action Sheffield working to help refugees and asylum seekers to get into worthwhile volunteering opportunities. Can give in-depth support to refugees and asylum seekers who want to volunteer, including helping to find a good volunteer placement, helping to fill in application forms, calling agencies and arranging appointments. Can accompany the volunteer to the first volunteering interview if necessary. Funded until March 2011. Self or any referral.
